___creationToken.description: A unique file path for the volume. Used when creating mount targets

___serviceLevel.description: The service level of the file system.

___usageThreshold.description: Maximum storage quota allowed for a file system in bytes. This is a soft quota used for alerting only. Minimum size is 100 GiB. Upper limit is 100TiB.
